A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a die hard fan os Star Wars for almost 30 years and this one I enjoyed watching very much. It was fun like other star wars movies\, yet it was different and unexpected. This movie doesn't deserve all the extreme negative reactions just because it wasn't what people expected. I would rate it with 4 of 5 stars\, but to counter all the negative ratings based on people's frustrations I gave it 5.
